attributes.action: Hold a General Election as he is not an elected Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has taken power without being elected by the citizens of this nation. This type of action is expected in dictatorships, but it is unacceptable in what is supposedly one of the leading democratic nations. Since Mr Brown refuses to resign, we, the undersigned, demand that a General Election is called immediately to restore democracy to this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
